languages.text: "Нам с Джаспером надо добыть какое-то оружие. Мы догоним вас в звездной гавани. Возможно, подберем кого-то из гарнизона или гражданских по пути".

traits.locale_text: "Нам с Джаспером надо добыть какое-то оружие. Мы догоним вас в звездной гавани. Возможно, подберем кого-то из гарнизона или гражданских по пути".

languages.text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."
languages.original_text: "Нам с Джаспером надо добыть какое-то оружие. Мы догоним вас в звездной гавани. Возможно, подберем кого-то из гарнизона или гражданских по пути".

traits.locale_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. Perhaps we'll pick up some people from the garrison along the way, or civilians."
"Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. Perhaps we'll pick up some people from the garrison along the way, or civilians."
"Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."
"Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."
"Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."
"Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

languages.text: "Jaspar und ich müssen Waffen beschaffen — ganz gleich welche. Wir holen Euch beim Raumhafen ein. Vielleicht sammeln wir unterwegs sogar Leute aus der Garnison oder Zivilisten auf."
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: "Jaspar und ich müssen Waffen beschaffen — ganz gleich welche. Wir holen Euch beim Raumhafen ein. Vielleicht sammeln wir unterwegs sogar Leute aus der Garnison oder Zivilisten auf."

languages.text: « Jaspar et moi devons trouver des armes, n'importe lesquelles. Nous vous rejoindrons à l'astroport. Nous récupérerons peut-être même des soldats de la garnison ou des civils en chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: « Jaspar et moi devons trouver des armes, n'importe lesquelles. Nous vous rejoindrons à l'astroport. Nous récupérerons peut-être même des soldats de la garnison ou des civils en chemin. »

languages.text: “我和贾斯帕必须弄点武器过来，什么武器都行。我们去星港跟您会合。去星港的路上，说不定我们会带上一些驻军或平民之类的。”
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: “我和贾斯帕必须弄点武器过来，什么武器都行。我们去星港跟您会合。去星港的路上，说不定我们会带上一些驻军或平民之类的。”

languages.text: 「ジャスパーと俺は武器を手に入れなければならない。どんな武器でも構わない。スターポートで合流します。途中で駐屯地から人々を拾うか、市民を拾うかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: 「ジャスパーと俺は武器を手に入れなければならない。どんな武器でも構わない。スターポートで合流します。途中で駐屯地から人々を拾うか、市民を拾うかもしれません」

languages.text: «Jaspar y yo debemos conseguir armas de cualquier tipo. Les alcanzaremos en el puerto estelar. Puede que incluso encontremos gente de la guarnición o civiles por el camino».
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: «Jaspar y yo debemos conseguir armas de cualquier tipo. Les alcanzaremos en el puerto estelar. Puede que incluso encontremos gente de la guarnición o civiles por el camino».

languages.text: "Jaspar'la bulabildiğimiz her silahı toplayacağız. Size yıldız limanında yetişiriz. Yolda garnizondan veya sivillerden birilerine rastlarsak onları da getiririz."
languages.original_text: "Jaspar and I must get weapons — any weapons. We'll catch up with you at the starport. We might even pick up some people from the garrison or civilians along the way."

traits.locale_text: "Jaspar'la bulabildiğimiz her silahı toplayacağız. Yıldız limanında sizinle buluşuruz. Gelirken garnizondakileri veya yolda gördüğümüz sivilleri de getirebiliriz."
